message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,800 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and I offer it to you for $10,650? This would be a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $10,650 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10,200. Can you meet me there?
